about_the_game:
Welcome to "Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy", a captivating 3D cooking adventure set in the heart of the old North. Assume the role of a Viking Chef and dive headfirst into the culinary chaos of a bustling Norse kitchen. Your mission? To serve the gods a feast of legendary proportions.



In "Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy", you'll find yourself in a culinary scramble, cooking up divine meals from ingredients available in your Viking larder. As you navigate the chaotic kitchen, you'll need to be swift, smart, and innovative. The gods are hungry and they won't wait forever!



Each scenario brings a new challenge and a new taste of the excitement in Viking culinary culture. From preparing the ingredients to mastering the art of Viking cuisine, you're in for a thrilling ride.



Prepare yourself for a heart-pounding, epicurean journey in a vibrant, Norse-inspired world. "Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy" is not just a cooking game; it's an adventure that tests your strategic skills and speed under pressure.

So, do you have what it takes to please the gods with your culinary prowess? Are you ready to stir up a storm in the Viking kitchen? Then grab your chef's hat and let the feast frenzy begin!
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Dynamic Cooking Scenarios: Experience diverse cooking environments, each offering unique challenges.
  • Co-op Gameplay: Collaborate with friends as you race against the sun to serve the gods.
  • Vivid 3D Environments: Immerse yourself in a detailed and vibrant Norse-inspired world.
  • Diverse Ingredients: Harness the resources of the Viking realm to prepare delicious dishes.
  • Godly Expectations: Please the Norse gods with your culinary masterpieces.

EARLY ACCESS - FEATURES

Play Modes:
  • Feast Mode (Default Mode): Serve specific Feast Menus to the gods until sunset.
  • Frenzy Mode (Extra Mode): Serve as many meals as possible before sunset.
Co-op Mode:
  • Engage in online co-op gameplay with up to 3 friends.
Meal Types:
  • Stews: Prepare in a large pot.
  • Pan Meals: Cook in a smaller pot.
  • Raw Food Salads: Craft a variety of fresh salads.

EARLY ACCESS - CONTENT

Scenarios:
  • Forest: Cook for the gods amidst the trees.
  • Viking Village: Serve meals on a quaint island village.
  • Boat: Satisfy the gods while sailing the vast ocean.
Scenario Difficulties:
(Each scenario requires progression through difficulties to unlock subsequent levels)
  • Easy: Focus on the Feast Mode with a select range of simpler meals.
  • Medium: Engage in the Feast Mode with a broader variety of meals, from simple to intricate.
  • Frenzy: Take on the challenge of the Frenzy Mode, where you must fulfill specific meal orders from the gods, each with its own time constraint.
Odin's Coin:
  • Earn a coin for every successfully served meal.
  • Beware! Failed servings deduct a coin from your total.
Character Customization:
  • Models: Choose from 6 unique character models.
  • Accessories: Customize with various accessories, purchasable with your accumulated Odin's Coins.
